item.title: SLAM webinar ‚ÄúIl Paesaggio Linguistico come risorsa per l'insegnamento dell'italiano a discenti stranieri. Metodi, modelli, buone pratiche‚Äù, 19 febbraio 2026, alle ore 15.00.
item.description: Sono aperte le iscrizioni al WEBINAR organizzato dal Centro Linguistico d‚ÄôAteneo SLAM dal titolo ‚ÄúIl Paesaggio Linguistico come risorsa per l'insegnamento dell'italiano a discenti stranieri. item.title: Final ranking for International mobility contributions academic year 2024/2025
item.description: The final ranking list for international mobility contributions a.y. 2024/2025 has been published. The outcome is available in your online helpdesk, under "Right to study, grants, accommodation and catering" > "if you want to access the details of the rankings published in the last two academic years".%0A

item.title: Extended weekend opening hours at the BICF Library
item.description: From Saturday, 7 February 2026, the Biology, Chemistry, Physics, and Computer Sciences Library (BICF) will extend its weekend opening hours: Saturday and Sunday, 9-20.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: University Library Service ‚Äì spring course calendar 2026
item.description: The list of courses offered by the University Library Service in spring 2026 is now online. These courses focus on the use of databases, and are open to the entire University community.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Call for the English language development course in view of the B1 Preliminary (PET) exam
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge B1 Preliminary (PET) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in March-April at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the English language development course in view of the B2 First (FCE) exam - SOLD OUT
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge B2 First (FCE) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in March-April at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call..%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Master's programmes Admissions A.Y. 2026/2027
item.description: Master's programmes Admissions for Academic Year 2026/2027 are now open.%0ANon-EU students visa applicants are required to apply for admission no later than 30 April 2026.%0A

item.title: Call for CELI 1 A2, CELI 2 B1 and CELI 3 B2 exams on 11 and 12 march 2026
item.description: The call is open to register for the CELI 1 A2, CELI 2 B1 and CELI 3 B2 exams scheduled on 11 and 12 march 2026.%0AN.B: seats for the CELI 2 B1 and CELI 3 B2 exams are sold out.%0A%0AüìÑ Bando CELI in inglese_11-12 marzo 2026_signed.pdf
